description:
Breathe easier while gazing at the watery world below. This mask's tempered glass windows offer clear viewing, while its flexible silicone face skirt wraps and adjusts comfortably to your face. An easy-breathing snorkel means you can cruise over colour-popping reefs or float with the fish without coming up for air.

  • Low profile 3-way buckles for easy mask adjustment
  • 2-windowed mask in durable tempered glass for clear viewing
  • Flexible hypoallergenic silicone skirt allows leak-resistent fit for most faces
  • Splashguard prevents water from entering the snorkel opening
  • Hypoallergenic silicone mouthpiece allows deep natural breathing
  • Wide diameter intake tube for unrestricted inhales and exhales
  • 1-way purge valve for fast clearing
name: Fathom Cozumel Mask and Snorkel
